00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MDNS_BROWSER_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MDNS_BROWSER_H_
00031 
00032 #include "lubyk.h"
00033 #include "mdns/AbstractBrowser.h"
00034 
00035 using namespace lubyk;
00036 
00037 #include <stdlib.h> // atoi
00038 
00039 namespace mdns {
00040 
00048 class Browser : public AbstractBrowser, public LuaObject
00049 {
00050 public:
00051   Browser(const char *service_type)
00052       : AbstractBrowser(service_type) {}
00053 
00054   ~Browser() {}
00055 
00056   const char *serviceType() {
00057     return service_type_.c_str();
00058   }
00059 
00062   int fd() {
00063     return fd_;
00064   }
00065 
00068   bool getServices() {
00069     return AbstractBrowser::getServices();
00070   }
00071 
00076   LuaStackSize nextService(lua_State *L) {
00077     if (found_services_.empty()) {
00078       return 0;
00079     }
00080     Service loc = found_services_.front();
00081     found_services_.pop();
00082 
00083     // create table {op = 'add/remove', name = 'x', host = '10.0.0.34', port = 7500, interface = 2}
00084     lua_newtable(L);
00085     // op = 'add/remove'
00086     lua_pushstring(L, "op");
00087     if (loc.is_add_) {
00088       lua_pushstring(L, "add");
00089     } else {
00090       lua_pushstring(L, "remove");
00091     }
00092     lua_settable(L, -3);
00093     // name = 'xxxx'
00094     lua_pushstring(L, "name");
00095     lua_pushstring(L, loc.name());
00096     lua_settable(L, -3);
00097     // host = 'gaspard.local' / '10.3.4.5'
00098     lua_pushstring(L, "host");
00099     lua_pushstring(L, loc.host());
00100     lua_settable(L, -3);
00101     // ip = '10.3.4.5' / 'localhost'
00102     lua_pushstring(L, "ip");
00103     lua_pushstring(L, loc.name_from_ip(loc.ip()).c_str());
00104     lua_settable(L, -3);
00105     // port = 7500
00106     lua_pushstring(L, "port");
00107     lua_pushnumber(L, loc.port());
00108     lua_settable(L, -3);
00109     // interface = 2
00110     lua_pushstring(L, "interface");
00111     lua_pushnumber(L, loc.interface());
00112     lua_settable(L, -3);
00113     // txt = {...}
00114     lua_pushstring(L, "txt");
00115     pushTxtRecord(L, loc.txt_);
00116     lua_settable(L, -3);
00117     return 1;
00118   }
00119 
00120 private:
00121   void pushTxtRecord(lua_State *L, const std::string &txt) {
00122     // [LEN] KEY ( EOF | '=' ) ( VALUE | EOF ) [LEN] ...
00123     lua_newtable(L);
00124     // ... <table>
00125     if (txt == "") return;
00126     size_t txt_len = txt.size();
00127     size_t pos = 0;
00128     while ( pos < txt_len ) {
00129       size_t l = txt.at(pos);
00130       ++pos;
00131       if (!l) break;
00132       std::string line = txt.substr(pos, l);
00133       size_t sep = line.find('=');
00134       if (sep == std::string::npos) {
00135         // boolean true
00136         lua_pushlstring(L, line.c_str(), line.size());
00137         lua_pushboolean(L, true);
00138       } else {
00139         std::string key, value;
00140         key   = line.substr(0, sep);
00141         value = line.substr(sep + 1);
00142         lua_pushlstring(L, key.c_str(), key.size());
00143         if (value.find_first_not_of("0123456789") == std::string::npos) {
00144           lua_pushnumber(L, atoi(value.c_str()));
00145         } else {
00146           lua_pushlstring(L, value.c_str(), value.size());
00147         }
00148       }
00149       lua_settable(L, -3);
00150       pos = pos + l;
00151     }
00152   }
00153 };
00154 } // mdns
00155
